firefox.notes: Firefox 47 and later support display-mode values fullscreen and browser. Firefox 57 added support for minimal-ui and standalone values.

firefox_android.notes: Only supports the browser value, which always reports true.

chrome.notes: Before Chrome 41, the implementation was buggy and reported (hover: none) on non-touch-based computers with a mouse/trackpad. See bug 441613.

__compat.description: Range syntax from Media Queries Level 4

firefox.notes: Only supports range notations where the feature name comes before any value (width > 500px)
